timeline.bodyText: If this throws InterruptedException then locked will be true but the lock will not have been acquired, and the finally block will attempt to unlock a lock it does not hold.
timeline.author: stuartwdouglas

replies.bodyText: I see. In that case locked should be initialized with false and set to true after the lock is acquired sucessfully.
replies.author: mkouba
